author: Julie Brugger et al
description: To further the development of usable climate science, this article addresses questions about what specific skills climate science integrators need to contribute to its development and how to provide these skills by presenting insights from interviews with highly experienced and respected ‘first-generation’ climate science integrators from across the U.S.
journal: Bulletin of the American Meteorological Society
title: Lessons from First Generation Climate Science Integrators
